name: neoprene
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of synthetic rubber (= made by a chemical process rather than natural) that is strong and keeps its shape well: He wore a tight-fitting neoprene wetsuit.
Cheryl Ramalho/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
